channel.title: Quest cape. need help! [fixed now thanks]
channel.description:
circled in green is the space the quest cape equips to. in red is the place i want to go when you put it on. here is the pic:
[IMG]http://i1031.photobucket.com/albums/y380/mrpopyman/questcapeerror.jpg[/img]
can some1 tell me how to fix this so the quest cape goes in the red area when you wear it? thanks..
all my other skillcapes go in the correct possition but this one doesnt? plz tell me how to fix!
